pages.backing: Master Poker Skills at PokerMentor - Online Training What is backing? Personal fund Contact Welcome to the Thrilling World of Poker What is a Backing Fund and Why Do Players Need It? Cashouts Hinder Progression: One of the main reasons for slow progress through the poker limits is frequent cashouts. If a player makes regular cashouts, it can delay their advancement to the next limit by several months or more. Consistent Limit Advancement: A backing fund offers players the opportunity to move up the limits regardless of cashouts or downswings in their poker game. The speed of climbing the limits depends solely on the player's current skill level. Support for Higher Limits: When a participant is ready to play at a higher limit, we provide the necessary conditions. These conditions allow them to fully realize their potential and achieve success in poker. Rapid Advancement Potential: With the right circumstances and minimal variance interference, a player can move from NL20 to NL100 within 2-3 months. Upon completing the contract, you'll have the opportunity to play independently at mid-level limits with a sufficient skill level to be successful. No Initial Investment Required: Training with the Backing Fund requires no financial investment from you. We fund your play and provide the conditions necessary to move to the next limit. This way, you can progress through each limit in as little as 2 weeks to 2 months. How Does the Training and Backing Process Work in Poker? Access to Training Resources: You'll gain access to a dashboard with training videos and statistics, providing excellent conditions for poker play. Homework and Game Analysis: To unlock the next lesson, the coach reviews your homework and analyzes your online poker gameplay. Regular Performance Reviews: Every 10k hands, the coach reviews your played hands database. If all criteria are met, your balance is topped up for playing at a higher limit. Continuous Cycle: This cycle repeats continuously, ensuring consistent development and progression through the poker limits. pages.disclaimer: Learn Poker Strategies at PokerMentor What is backing? Personal fund Contact Welcome to the Thrilling World of Poker Disclaimer At PokerMentor, we are dedicated to providing comprehensive training and resources to enhance your poker skills. However, it's essential to understand the following: 1. **Risk of Gambling:** Poker involves financial risk. Players should exercise caution and gamble responsibly. Never bet more than you can afford to lose. 2. **Legal Age:** Participants must be at least 18 years old or of legal gambling age in their jurisdiction. 3. **Educational Purpose:** PokerMentor offers educational content and does not guarantee winnings. Success in poker depends on skill, strategy, and chance. 4. **Financial Advice:** The information provided is for educational purposes only and should not be considered financial advice. Consult a professional if needed. 5. **Third-Party Content:** We may link to third-party sites or resources. PokerMentor is not responsible for the content or practices of these sites. 6. **Updates:** Policies, terms, and offerings at PokerMentor may change. We recommend reviewing our terms and conditions regularly. By using PokerMentor and its services, you acknowledge and agree to these terms. For any questions or concerns, please contact us through our contact page. pages.fund: PokerMentor: Elevate Your Game with Expert Coaching What is backing? Personal fund Contact Welcome to the Thrilling World of Poker POKER FUND: CREATE YOUR PERSONAL FUND WITH OUR HELP If poker is more than just a game to you, you can create your own personal poker fund with PokerMentor and build your team of players. This offer is especially relevant for online poker coaches. We take care of the profitable deals, operational work, experience, and even player balances, allowing you to focus on filling the fund with players and overseeing the training process. You manage the fund exclusively, and the responsibility for decisions remains with you. Submit your request WE INVITE STAKING POKER FUNDS, POKER SCHOOLS, AND POKER COACHES TO COLLABORATE What is the cost of training players at NL2, NL5 - $3, $5, or $15? And how much do players at these limits earn per month - $50, $70, or $100? Now, let's consider mobile club poker apps, where the competition is much weaker. This means an NL2 player from a regular room can comfortably play at the NL10 limit in apps, and an NL5 player can comfortably play at the NL20 limit. If players improve their skills, they can play at even higher limits and win against even stronger opponents. Only those who are diligent and forward-thinking can earn as much passively as they do actively by conducting training for a fixed fee. An "active approach" means working here and now. A "passive approach" is the result of cumulative actions and, in the long run, does not depend on immediate efforts. pages.index: Learn Poker Online with PokerMentor What is backing? Personal fund Contact Welcome to the Thrilling World of Poker Unlock Your Poker Potential with PokerMentor Join our community and start your journey to becoming a poker master. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced player, PokerMentor offers tailored coaching to elevate your game. Get Started High-Quality Training Experienced Coaches Proven Results Flexible Learning Why Choose PokerMentor? At PokerMentor, we offer a unique learning experience that combines expert coaching with a supportive community. Our programs are designed to help you succeed, no matter your starting level. Here’s why PokerMentor stands out as the best choice for your poker education: Benefits of Learning with Us: Expert Coaching: Our coaches are professional poker players with years of experience in both playing and teaching. They provide insights and strategies that you won’t find anywhere else. Personalized Training: We understand that every player is different. That’s why we tailor our coaching programs to meet your specific needs and goals, ensuring you get the most out of your training. Proven Track Record: Many of our students have gone on to achieve significant success in the poker world, thanks to our effective training methods. Comprehensive Curriculum: Our courses cover everything from basic poker rules to advanced strategies. Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced player, you’ll find valuable lessons at PokerMentor. Interactive Learning: Our platform offers interactive lessons, quizzes, and real-time feedback to help you learn and retain information more effectively. Community Support: Join a community of like-minded individuals who share your passion for poker. Learn, share, and grow together with fellow students and coaches. Flexible Schedule: Our online courses are designed to fit into your busy schedule. Learn at your own pace, from anywhere, at any time. Regular Updates: The world of poker is constantly evolving, and so are our courses. We regularly update our content to include the latest strategies and trends in the poker world. Access to Resources: Gain access to a wealth of resources, including videos, articles, and live webinars, to enhance your learning experience. Join Our Winning Team At PokerMentor, we believe in the power of community. By joining our team, you'll gain access to exclusive resources, competitions, and opportunities to collaborate with other top players. Exclusive Resources Access training materials and strategies used by professionals. Our extensive library includes video tutorials, written guides, and interactive lessons designed to enhance your skills at every level. Stay ahead with the latest poker trends and techniques. We constantly update our resources to reflect the most recent developments in the poker world, ensuring you always have the most current knowledge and strategies at your disposal. Get insider tips and secrets from top poker players. Our resources include exclusive interviews and breakdowns of their most successful plays, giving you an edge over your competition. Competitive Environment Participate in exclusive tournaments and challenges. We offer a variety of competitions tailored to different skill levels, so you can always find a game that matches your abilities and pushes you to improve. Test your skills against other top players. Our platform connects you with a global community of poker enthusiasts, allowing you to compete and learn from the best in the field. Earn recognition and rewards for your achievements. Our tournaments offer not just the thrill of competition, but also tangible rewards and accolades to celebrate your progress and victories. Collaborative Learning Learn and grow with a supportive community. Our forums and discussion groups are filled with passionate players who are eager to share their experiences and advice. Share insights and strategies with fellow members. Engage in lively discussions, dissect complex plays, and receive feedback from peers and coaches alike. Build lasting relationships with like-minded individuals. The connections you make here can lead to lifelong friendships and valuable networking opportunities within the poker world. Submit your request Start Your Poker Journey Today At PokerMentor, we are committed to helping you become the best poker player you can be. Our tailored training programs, experienced coaches, and supportive community are here to guide you every step of the way. Don't wait any longer to elevate your game. Join PokerMentor today and start seeing results! With our proven methods and dedicated support, you'll be well on your way to poker success. Let's make your poker dreams a reality together. Sign up now and discover the PokerMentor difference. 450+ Students Trained 25 Expert Coaches 350 Hours of Content 670 Success Stories Become Part of Our Elite Team At PokerMentor, we're always looking for talented individuals to join our team. Whether you're an experienced player or just starting out, we offer opportunities to grow and excel. Gain valuable insights from top players and coaches. Compete in high-stakes tournaments and challenges. Access exclusive training materials and resources. Collaborate with a community of passionate players. Join us at PokerMentor and take your poker skills to the next level. We're excited to have you on our team! pages.privacy-policy: PokerMentor - Expert Poker Coaching Online What is backing? Personal fund Contact Welcome to the Thrilling World of Poker Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to PokerMentor. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website and use our services. Information We Collect We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment details when you register for our courses or subscribe to our newsletter. We also collect non-personal information such as your IP address and browser type for analytics purposes. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, process transactions, and personalize your experience. Your email address, provided during registration or subscription, may be used to send you updates, promotional offers, and newsletters. Security of Your Information We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Sharing Your Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law or to fulfill our services (e.g., payment processing or customer support). Your Choices and Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also unsubscribe from marketing communications at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in our emails or contacting us directly. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy or the handling of your personal information, please contact us at pokermentor@gmail.com. This Privacy Policy was last updated on [Date]. We may update this policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Please review this page regularly for updates.
